playbook.title: vContext Development Practices
playbook.description: Accumulated best practices and conventions for contributing to the vContext project

items.title: Use task targets for repeatable actions
items.content: Always use `task` targets defined in Taskfile.yml for repeatable actions rather than documenting raw shell commands. This ensures consistency and maintainability across the project.

items.title: Follow Conventional Commits specification
items.content: All commit messages must follow the Conventional Commits specification (https://www.conventionalcommits.org/en/v1.0.0/). This enables automated changelog generation and semantic versioning. Format: `type(scope): description`. Common types: feat, fix, docs, refactor, test, chore. Examples: 'docs: update spec', 'feat(api-go): add validator'.
